amendment.description: To set aside $3,000,000 of the RDT&E, Navy, funds for development and testing of the Advanced Ferrite Antenna.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3179 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3179 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To set aside $3,000,000 of the RDT&E, Navy, funds for development and testing of the Advanced Ferrite Antenna.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3179 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3179 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott.
